summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.7°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 773 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1471 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 773.1m lower than yesterday, 593.1m lower than the past week, 1471.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1213.3m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dark. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
